trigger.name: Red Alarm on {HOSTNAME}
trigger.description: A red alarm is reporting on this device. Please login to the CLI and check what this alert has been caused by.

trigger.name: Yellow Alarm on {HOSTNAME}
trigger.description: A yellow alarm is reporting on this device. Please login to the CLI and check what this alert has been caused by.

trigger_prototype.name: BGP status on {HOST.HOST} changed from establish on neighbour {#BGPPEER}

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Juniper QFX5200 SNMPv3:1.3.6.1.2.1.2.2.1.8.[{#IFNAME}].avg(7200)}<2 and {Template Juniper QFX5200 SNMPv3:1.3.6.1.2.1.2.2.1.8.[{#IFNAME}].last()}=2 and {Template Juniper QFX5200 SNMPv3:1.3.6.1.2.1.31.1.1.1.18.[{#IFNAME}].str(this_does_not_exist)}=0
trigger_prototype.name: Interface status on {HOST.HOST}: {#IFNAME}, {ITEM.VALUE2} : {ITEM.VALUE3}
trigger_prototype.description: Interface status went up to down !!! Interface : {#SNMPVALUE}, {ITEM.VALUE1} = {ITEM.VALUE3}

dependency.name: Interface status on {HOST.HOST}: {#IFNAME}, {ITEM.VALUE2} : {ITEM.VALUE3}
dependency.expression: {Template Juniper QFX5200 SNMPv3:1.3.6.1.2.1.2.2.1.8.[{#IFNAME}].avg(7200)}<2 and {Template Juniper QFX5200 SNMPv3:1.3.6.1.2.1.2.2.1.8.[{#IFNAME}].last()}=2 and {Template Juniper QFX5200 SNMPv3:1.3.6.1.2.1.31.1.1.1.18.[{#IFNAME}].str(this_does_not_exist)}=0

dependency.name: Interface status on {HOST.HOST}: {#IFNAME}, {ITEM.VALUE2} : {ITEM.VALUE3}
dependency.expression: {Template Juniper QFX5200 SNMPv3:1.3.6.1.2.1.2.2.1.8.[{#IFNAME}].avg(7200)}<2 and {Template Juniper QFX5200 SNMPv3:1.3.6.1.2.1.2.2.1.8.[{#IFNAME}].last()}=2 and {Template Juniper QFX5200 SNMPv3:1.3.6.1.2.1.31.1.1.1.18.[{#IFNAME}].str(this_does_not_exist)}=0

dependency.name: Interface status on {HOST.HOST}: {#IFNAME}, {ITEM.VALUE2} : {ITEM.VALUE3}
dependency.expression: {Template Juniper QFX5200 SNMPv3:1.3.6.1.2.1.2.2.1.8.[{#IFNAME}].avg(7200)}<2 and {Template Juniper QFX5200 SNMPv3:1.3.6.1.2.1.2.2.1.8.[{#IFNAME}].last()}=2 and {Template Juniper QFX5200 SNMPv3:1.3.6.1.2.1.31.1.1.1.18.[{#IFNAME}].str(this_does_not_exist)}=0

trigger_prototype.name: {HOSTNAME} {#SNMPVALUE} - High temperature
trigger_prototype.description:
The temperature of this switch is above 60ºC.
Please check the status of the fans and environmental conditions immediately.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Juniper QFX5200 SNMPv3:jnxOperatingCPU.[{#SNMPVALUE}].min(30)}>70 and {Template Juniper QFX5200 SNMPv3:jnxOperatingCPU.[{#SNMPVALUE}].min(30)}<95 and {Template Juniper QFX5200 SNMPv3:jnxOperating5MinLoadAvg.[{#SNMPVALUE}].last(30)}>100 and {Template Juniper QFX5200 SNMPv3:jnxOperating5MinLoadAvg.[{#SNMPVALUE}].last(0)}<300
trigger_prototype.name: {HOSTNAME} {#SNMPVALUE} - CPU usage above 70%
trigger_prototype.description: The CPU load on this node has increased to over 70%. If this is a sudden or unexpected increase, immediate investigation is advised.

trigger_prototype.name: {HOSTNAME} {#SNMPVALUE} - High CPU usage (95%)
trigger_prototype.description: The CPU load on this node has increased to over 95%. If this is a sudden or unexpected increase, immediate investigation is advised.
